function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Few risk calculators account for all three routes of transmission: fomite, airborne, and droplets, potentially underestimating the virus exposure dose for occupants.","Impact":"Increased virus exposure dose for occupants leading to higher risk of infection and transmission.","Mitigation":"Develop integrated risk assessments to examine all three routes of transmission and implement engineering controls and environmental management practices to reduce exposure.","Technologies":"Integrated risk assessment tools, engineering controls, environmental management systems.","People":"Occupants, building occupants, policymakers, researchers.","Owner":"Policymakers, building managers, researchers, facility management experts."},{"Description":"Limited understanding of the integrated effects of solutions, such as whether different interventions are additive, multiplicative, or contradictory in their outcomes.","Impact":"Ineffective decision-making regarding interventions and their combined effects, leading to potential inefficiencies and increased risk of transmission.","Mitigation":"Conduct systematic analysis of interventions' combined effects and cost-effectiveness, and provide clear guidelines for policymakers and building managers.","Technologies":"Systematic analysis tools, decision-making frameworks, cost-effectiveness analysis.","People":"Policymakers, building managers, researchers, facility management experts.","Owner":"Policymakers, building managers, researchers, facility management experts."},{"Description":"Insufficient investigation of the cost-effectiveness of various interventions and combinations, including ongoing maintenance costs, energy consumption, and impacts on the FM budget.","Impact":"Inadequate consideration of long-term financial implications, potential budget constraints, and inefficiencies in intervention decision-making.","Mitigation":"Conduct life cycle cost analyses (LCCs), budget impact analyses (BIAs), and estimates of short-and medium-to long-term budget changes associated with intervention adoption.","Technologies":"Life cycle cost analysis tools, budget impact analysis tools, financial modeling software.","People":"Policymakers, building managers, finance experts, facility management experts.","Owner":"Policymakers, building managers, finance experts, facility management experts."}]}
